# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. After careful consideration and evaluation, I believe this product would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I propose a purchase price of $10,000. This offers a fair compromise between the perceived value to you and the cost to me. I look forward to your response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
